about_the_game:
Max Capacity is a challenging and rewarding game that will test your skills as a factory mogul. In this exhilarating simulation, you'll assume the mantle of a shrewd factory mogul, tasked with crafting the most efficient production line imaginable. Your mission is to navigate the ever-shifting tides of the market, outmaneuver your rivals, and emerge as the undisputed champion of manufacturing excellence.

In single-player mode, you can compete against other players on the Steam leaderboards to see who can make the most money. In multiplayer mode, you can work together with other players to complete contracts and earn even more money.

Here are some of the things that make Max Capacity an exciting game to play:
  • Challenge of building and managing an efficient factory.
  • Ever-changing market conditions that keep you on your toes.
  • Opportunity to compete against other players on the Steam leaderboards.
  • Teamwork and cooperation required in multiplayer mode.
  • Accomplishment when you successfully complete a contract or achieve a goal.

If you're looking for a factory simulation game that is both challenging and rewarding, then start playing Max Capacity today!

name: Max Capacity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 730 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 Super / RX 5700 XT (8GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step into the high-pressure world of industry and unleash your inner factory tycoon with Max Capacity - the ultimate test of your strategic prowess and financial savvy.
